Reviews.Title: Xperia Z1 is Amazing
Reviews.Author: Raul
Reviews.Content: When I received the phone, I was very satisfied with the packaging. I it was well packaged and the box in excellent condition when opened. When I opened the box, I was pleasantly surprised. The contents consisted of, of course the phone, a pair of headphones, the charger with a U.S. adapter and charging cable, the manuals, and the phone charging dock, which was awesome because, that alone I've seen sold on Amazon for $35 or so.But to the phone which is beautiful, by the way. Other than the fact that the phone is a finger print magnet, it definitely has a premium feel. I'm in love with the color and the look and feel of the phone. The sound quality is great. The speaker has a nice sound and the call quality has been great. I'm currently with T-mobile in the U.S. and the LTE works great here in San Diego. The performance has also not let me down. I've been using the phone for games and internet and music and I've had no issues with lagging and the battery life has been pretty good as well. I haven't managed to bring it below 30% yet with heavy use. Great phone.

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Aliyu A. Mustapha "JoKa"
Reviews.Content: Cool, everything in perfect condition. But find out the phone is from Hong Kong and not the USA like I expected. Nothing is different, but firmware is set to Hk and also language at first boot is set to Chinese, no big deal coz can be changed back to English or whatever language required.I do love my Z1;-)

Reviews.Title: Sony Xperia Z1 C6903 (Honami) 16GB Purple
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: Sony Xperia Z1 C6903 (Honami) 16GB Purple is very beautiful. And Android system is very fast. A few unuseful app.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Adelbert W.
Reviews.Content: i had i phone 4s and i think that this phone is so much better.the camera is great .

Reviews.Title: Great phone! Seller wasn't the best
Reviews.Author: abbas
Reviews.Content: This phone is beautiful  and powerful! What more would you want?! oh and almost forgot it's waterproof! But the reason why I have it a 3 star was because of the seller. First off the phone on the box was black so that means my phone wasn't sealed from the factory. As you read the other review The guy said he got a dock charger with his phone, the main reason why I bought it from this seller because I wanted the dock charger, but when I opened the box there wasn't a dock charger, but there was a manual on how to hook up the dock charger. So that mean the seller took it out of the box. I connect the seller they said to send it back. I didn't have time for that.

Reviews.Content: sony  Xperia z1 ( factory unlocked)  nice phone/ from this stores/ that  I. can remember / thank you/have nice day/

Reviews.Title: Sony Xperia Z1
Reviews.Author: Rick Chavez
Reviews.Content: great form factor, very nice pictures, great Android device.  The music playback through the Walkman app is qualitatively better than the 'stock' Android music apps.

Reviews.Title: Sony Xperia Z1
Reviews.Author: Andrés Felipe
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with my new cell phone.You will not regret of buying it!The camera takes excellent images.About battery life, i would like it to be more durable.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Yalexis B. Gomez R "YALEXIS GOMEZ"
Reviews.Content: excellent phone, I recommend it 100%,good seller, only bad thing was that the charger is Asian but brought Adapter, excuse my English is that I am from Venezuela

Reviews.Title: excellent product!
Reviews.Author: Macarena Antoniello García
Reviews.Content: Incredible cell phone! I totally recommend it. Both screen and camara are amazing. Fast and comfortable. In my opinion it's much better than Iphone

Reviews.Title: debe mejorar
Reviews.Author: ever perez
Reviews.Content: should improve more the customer care this xperia had no magnetic charger while I made this purchase buy another xperia z1 which came with magnetic charger included where purchases this model came me $ 40 dollars more than the other and got Genuine Sony Magnetic Charging Dock DK31

Reviews.Title: highly underrated phone
Reviews.Author: Mohan Aaron Bayona
Reviews.Content: Fun to use. Cool beans. Great handling! Awesome battery life. Worth every penny spent on this device. Recommend to buy.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Nial Alexander
Reviews.Content: It's just the best phone I ever had water proof,nice picture, fast, and love the little accessories that you can get
